Class JSchool

java.lang.Object
JSchool
public class JSchool extends Object
The class JSchool is a collection of classes, lecture halls, instructors, and students at a college.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    JSchool()
    Returns a JSchool.
